textfields.tf: Height sensor 441 050 123 0 with linkage to measure the actual level
The ECAS ECU converts each sensor signal to a count value, which means to a byte value betwwen 4 and 255 counts.
Newer ECAS ECUs: 16-bit processing between 256 and 65535 timer ticks
Up to now: 8-bit processing between 4 and 255 counts
